alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Victoria County through 515 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, or over Victoria, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Dacosta, Wood Hi, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner, Ball Airport Area, Downtown Victoria and Bloomington. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 642. US Highway 77 between mile markers 568 and 580. US Highway 87 between mile markers 800 and 822. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
